title: The most important century in human history

options.text: Pressure difference

options.text: Navier-Stokes equations

options.text: To be more cautious and hesitant in taking risks.

options.label: B
options.text: To be brave and take on new challenges.

options.label: C
options.text: To focus on your current strengths and abilities.

options.label: D
options.text: To ignore your future self and focus on the present.

options.label: B
options.text: That people do change over time and become different people.

options.label: C

options.label: D
options.text: That people should focus on the present moment and ignore the future.

options.label: A
options.text: To be more confident and assertive in expressing their views.

options.label: B
options.text: To consider the possibility that their future self may disagree with their current views.

options.label: C
options.text: To be brave and take on new challenges.

options.label: D

options.label: A
